status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

fields.description:
{code:java}
JdbcSchema schema = new JdbcSchema(ds, jc.dialect, jc, null/*catalog */, null/*schema */);
JdbcTable jt = (JdbcTable) schema.getTable(tableName);
{code}

fields.summary: JDBC CBO Failed When Duplicate TableName Existed in Different Schema
